gameDetails.name: Suburbia: Con Tiles
gameDetails.description:
Add the five most important gaming conventions in the world to your city with Suburbia: Con Tiles. These tiles are fully compatible with the Suburbia base game, while also including stars to work with the Suburbia 5â˜… expansion. This expansion includes tiles for:


    Kublacon (San Francisco, CA, USA / Memorial Day weekend, May)
    Dice Tower Con (Orlando, FL, USA / June)
    Gen Con (Indianapolis, IN, USA / Late July/Early August)
    Essen Spiel (Essen, Germany / October)
    BGG.CON (Dallas, TX, USA / November)


These tiles can be obtained individually at Kublacon, Gen Con, Spiel, and BGG.CON at the Bezier Games booth or as a preorder set through Bezier Games. Additional sets of these tiles may be available for purchase following the 2015 conventions or at the BoardGameGeekStore.
